mapper.select: SELECT rec.*, COUNT(rec.no) AS songcount FROM recommend rec INNER JOIN recommend_list list ON rec.no = list.package_id WHERE order_id != 0 AND group_id = #{group_id} GROUP BY rec.no ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT rec.sub_title, COUNT(rec.no) AS songcount FROM recommend rec INNER JOIN recommend_list list ON rec.no = list.package_id WHERE rec.no = #{no}

SELECT song.no AS songList_no, song.title AS songList_title , (SELECT album FROM album WHERE album_no=album.no) AS songList_album , (SELECT img_org FROM album WHERE album_no=album.no) AS songList_albumImg , (SELECT artist FROM artist WHERE artist_no=artist.no) AS songList_artist FROM song WHERE no IN (SELECT list.song_no FROM recommend_list list INNER JOIN recommend rec ON list.package_id = rec.no WHERE rec.no = #{no}
);
